item.title: Kerry add a quote by Gertrude Stein
item.description: "It takes a lot of time to be a genius. You have to sit around so much, doing nothing, really doing nothing." -- Gertrude Stein

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Gertrude Stein
item.description: "Everybody gets so much information all day long that they lose their common sense." -- Gertrude Stein

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Gertrude Stein
item.description: "If you can't say anything nice about anyone else, come sit next to me." -- Gertrude Stein

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Do stuff. be clenched, curious. Not waiting for inspiration's shove or society's kiss on your forehead. Pay attention. It's all about paying attention. attention is vitality. It connects you with others. It makes you eager. stay eager." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Interpretation is the revenge of the intellectual upon art. " -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "I haven't been everywhere, but it's on my list." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "Sanity is a cozy lie." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "And so it goes..." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr
item.description: "Dear future generations: Please accept our apologies. We were rolling drunk on petroleum." -- Kurt Vonnegut, Jr

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Richard Leigh
item.description: "You’ve got to sing like you don’t need the money, Love like you’ll never get hurt. You’ve got to dance like nobody’s watchin’." -- Richard Leigh

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "If you can do no good, at least do no harm." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "For life is the best thing we have in this existence. And if we should desire to believe in something, it should be a beacon within. This beacon being the sun, sea, and sky, our children, our work, our companions and, most simply put, the embodiment of love." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Kerry add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Marlene Dietrich
item.description: "It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter." -- Marlene Dietrich

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Always do what you are afraid to do." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Joe Strummer
item.description: "If I had five million pounds I'd start a radio station because something needs to be done. It would be nice to turn on the radio and hear something that didn't make you feel like smashing up the kitchen and strangling the cat." -- Joe Strummer

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Muriel Barbery
item.description: "...we have to surpass ourselves every day, make every day undying. Climb our own personal Everest and do it in such a way that every step is a little bit of eternity. That's what the future is for: to build the present, with real plans, made by living people." -- Muriel Barbery

item.title: Kerry add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx
